name: Evergarden (itch)
description:
Evergarden is a 2D Rogue-like game where you play "Akel", an angel who's supposed to defeat the Devil in hell, in order to take back his aureola.

It is written in Python, using Pygame.

Evergarden was made by 3 people :

-Me, Augustin MERCIER "Gugustinette" as a developer and composer

-Killian, as a developer and pixel artist

-Loïc, as a pixel artist
